answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer: We‚Äôre building and evangelizing new public goods streaming funding mechanisms. We believe streaming funding creates donor/grantee incentive alignment and promotes sustainability. Our first partner SQF round has streamed over 25.5 ETH to OSS/public goods builders. More funding rounds and mechanisms are on the way.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer:
We‚Äôre a pioneer in streaming* funding allocation strategies. Streaming Quadratic Funding uses the familiar QF matching formula but creates a totally different funding dynamic. We‚Äôve built a [no-code UI for operators to launch, fund, and manage SQF rounds](https://flowstate.network/admin). This doesn‚Äôt exist anywhere else. Flow Splitters (teams/guilds) and Flow Councils (direct voting) are our emerging apps bringing streaming capabilities to new contexts.

*Superfluid's streaming model is "token-centric" and allows for gasless, real-time settlement. Other streaming solutions are more akin to "streaming accounting" because a withdrawal transaction is required to access funds. We think the Superfluid model will allow more composability, capital efficiency, and programmability.
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer:
We‚Äôre bootstrapped and taking less than ‚Äúfull-time‚Äù pay for our efforts. All the funding will be used to sustain our core team and cover incidental costs. Our roadmap includes:
- Launching more SQF rounds with partners
- Developing a no-code launcher for Flow Councils
- Adding an API and other tools for dynamic unit management of Flow Splitters
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]‚Äîfor example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Flow State (Streaming Quadratic Funding)
project.description:
Flow State is a streaming funding platform & builder cooperative that makes working for and investing in the public good more sustainable.

We‚Äôre focused on two key ideas:
* **Streaming allocation mechanisms** - Using the full potential of programmable money to deliver continuous funding where and when needed
* **Digital cooperative legal structure** - Combining a traditional legal structure with web3 rails to reward impact creators and funders with rights to the org‚Äôs future cash flows (in a transparent, compliant way).

Our flagship product, Streaming Quadratic Funding (SQF), brings the free-rider-incentive-busting quadratic funding mechanism to a real-time, continuous form. With SQF...

* Public good builders **earn sustainable funding** by delivering on their mission‚Äîfewer distractions hunting/shilling grants and more focus on growing impact and cultivating long-term supporter relationships.
* Donors **make high-conviction funding decisions** where and when they find something they care about rather than in chaotic, time-constrained voting periods. Think of it like a QF-supercharged Patreon where supporters invest in future value creation rather than providing one-off charity.
* Ecosystems **attract, retain, and amplify talent.** No one likes funding uncertainty, administrative delays, or capital inefficiency. Streaming grants are a competitive advantage on both sides of the impact funding equation.

[You can now launch your own SQF round on Arbitrum, Base, or Optimism with no code!](https://flowstate.network/admin)

**Streams are the future of public goods funding.**

Programmable money streams are awesome. They provide a foundation for more composable, capable, and efficient money. SQF really is just the start of what we can do with [Superfluid-style streaming](https://x.com/GravenPrest/status/1892713630707163418).

We've recently developed and released tools like [Flow Splitters](https://flowstate.network/flow-splitters) for teams, guilds (ÔªøüëÄÔªø [more here soon](https://guildguild.xyz)), and communities to manage dynamic many-to-many streams.

We have a flexible, direct voting strategy ([Flow Councils](https://github.com/flow-state-coop/council)) queued up for the right partner/use case ([hit us up](https://t.me/flowstatecoop)).

And Flow State was recently included in Superfluid's [Streaming Programmatic Rewards campaign](https://claim.superfluid.org/apps). It has helped push our [Octant SQF round over 25.5 ETH streamed to builders and 1,300+ concurrent donation streams](https://flowstate.network/pool?chainId=8453&poolId=63)!

Stay tuned for more exciting announcements in Q2 2025!
